Achievements

Influencer Marketing Manager

As an Influencer Marketing Manager at Aithor,
I successfully spearheaded major campaigns with budgets ranging from $1M to $6.5M.
These campaigns achieved over 37 million views across various social platforms
reaching diverse audiences in multiple regions and delivering exceptional engagement and impact.

Affiliate Marketing Manager

Built a 120+ affiliate network, driving $6.5k in sales and 7M+ social views.
Boosted conversions by 25% with tiered commissions and optimized ROI by 30% via data-driven strategies.
Launched incentive programs, increasing engagement by 60%, and negotiated terms to reduce CPA by 15%.

International consultant

Advised 50+ multinational clients on global benefits programs,
mergers & acquisitions, and benefits integration.
Conducted multi-country due diligence for $370k+ M&A deals, ensuring seamless benefits transitions.
Optimized bonus & promo code strategies, boosting client engagement by 40% and cost-efficiency by 25%.
Managed 3K+ client database, delivering data-driven insights to enhance decision-making and ROI

Export, Import, Sales, and Procurement Manager

Secured and managed a high-value Egyptian client for Russian paper imports,
achieving a long-term contract of 50 tons/month.
Conducted international market research across MENA,
identifying buyers and suppliers.
Managed 150+ B2B client meetings in the Middle East, Africa, and Turkey,
driving cross-border partnerships.
Translated company websites & catalogs (EN↔AR) to enhance market reach.
Represented the Russian Chamber of Commerce in trade delegations, supporting bilateral agreements.
